title: WTB: Cubs T206 - Only a couple more
author: npa589

posts.post_title: WTB: Cubs T206 - Only a couple more
posts.post_content:
I'm close to completing my Cubs T206 set, I prefer graded, but will look at raw cards. I pay quickly through Paypal, and am willing to do PayPal (Money Owed). 

For a very quick response, e-mail me at: [url]npa589@yahoo.com[/url]

I'm looking to purchase the following:

I also need these:

Johnny Evers (Cubs Shirt)

Johnny Evers (Chicago Shirt) (Have one, but it's only SGC A)

Joe Tinker Bat off Sholulder

I'm actively checking this forum, but if you have any of these, and are willing to talk price, e-mail me! Really, I am interested in ALL Cubs T206 cards, especially the portraits. I have about 65 of them, obviously with a bunch of duplicates.

Thank you, and thank you for your help,

Nate

$99 delivered (includes insurance and delivery confirmation on the package).  PayPal OK.

[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/OrvalOverallhandfacelevelT206Old-1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/OrvalOverallhandfacelevelT206OldMil.jpg[/IMG]

I really would like to add the Overall portrait and the Steinfeldt portrait.

I'm very interested! Pm or e-mail me. I respond immediately.

Thanks
Thank you Steigman for your business! I look forward to receiving the card.

Thank you to all who have sent offers, they are much appreciated.

I'm getting closer and closer to completing the set. 

Thanks, 

Nate
no longer need the Chance Yellow Portrait! Thanks!

Friendly bump...

Would be interested in, but the Steinfeldt and Overall portraits have been purchased.

Thanks.
still looking for a few, anxious to acquire them
I've just started my Cubs T206 set.  This will be fun

Awesome man! Yea, it's addicting man, let me tell you. For me, this new, now big, part of my life started with one thought on Jan 20, 2011. I thought, "Ya know, it would be pretty cool to own 1 baseball card of Tinker, Evers, and Chance (I was reminded of the poem when writing an essay on the beauty of baseball, and why the public is sensitive to it.). Well, that one thought has turned into this. I have picked up around 110 T206 cards, with the majority of them being Cubs. 

Hey, if you are interested, I have about 75 Cubs T206 cards (duplicates of many). Let me know what condition you are looking for, and in most cases I might be able to oblige your interest. The only ones I do not have are the aforementioned Tinker Bat-off and Evers-Cubs shirt. 

My e-mail is [url]npa589@yahoo.com[/url] if you have specific cards you are looking for.

That was EXACTLY how I started!  I got Frank Chance in Sept. of last year and then thought it would be cool to get Tinker and Evers.  I'm only at 3 cards right now  Chance yellow background, Tinker bat off shoulder and Pfeister.  After the tax check comes I'll be sending you an email.  Have you read the book Crazy '08?  Well worth checking out

Bump - I picked up an Evers - Cubs shirt, but still would be interested in acquiring a graded 3 or 4 (PSA, maybe SGC). 

The ONLY one I don't have is the Tinker - Bat Off. I'm looking for any card that has a great front. I'm interested in 1s, 2s, 3s, 4s. It can be an awesome front with an awful back. 

Thank you for your help!

Please E-mail (PMs are not preferred): [url]npa589@yahoo.com[/url]
